page.title: 20AULDEARN
page.content: Our block contains part of the village of{Auldearn.}The village is bisected by the main{Inverness {-Aberdeen Road.}The heavy traffic flow through the village causes considerable problems for the residents.Some residents have their front doors less than a metre from the roadway and most winters at least one house suffers damage from vehicles colliding with it.{Plans}have been made for many years for a{bi-pass}for the village but as yet the work has not begun. On the outskirts of the village is a{ {Dovecot}owned by the{National trust for{Scotland. {Auldearn}is famous for being the last place in Scotland to burn a witch at the stake.{Isobel Gowdie}was tried for witchcraft in{April 1662.
